G-MEDIC est une société spécialisée dans: G-MEDIC is a company specialized in selling Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) devices, one of the main pillars in the treatment of sleep apnea syndrome. Our commitment to quality and innovation allows us to offer effective therapeutic solutions...

est une société spécialisée dans la vent: is a company specializing in the sale of continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) devices, which are one of the main pillars in the treatment of sleep apnea syndrome. Our commitment to quality and innovation allows us to offer effective therapeutic solutions...

se consacre à révolutionner le traitemen: is dedicated to revolutionizing the treatment of sleep apnea syndrome through advanced medical technologies and high‑quality personalized support.
Une approche scientifique pour comprendr: A scientific approach to understanding and effectively treating
Le_syndrome_apnées_obstructives_du_somme: Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome (OSAS) is a respiratory disorder characterized by repeated interruptions of breathing during sleep. These respiratory pauses, lasting from 10 to 30 seconds, occur when the upper airways collapse partially or completely.
Chaque_apnée_chute_du_taux_oxygène: Each apnea episode causes a drop in blood oxygen levels, forcing the brain to interrupt sleep to restore breathing. This cycle repeats dozens or even hundreds of times each night.
5 à 30 arrêts respiratoires par heure de: 5 to 30 breathing stops per hour of sleep
Le_SAOS_se_manifeste_par_des_symptômes: OSAS manifests with characteristic night‑time and daytime symptoms that significantly impact quality of life.
non_traité: If untreated, OSAS exposes to severe cardiovascular, metabolic and neurological complications that evolve gradually.
Hypertension_artérielle: High blood pressure, arrhythmias, heart failure and increased risk of heart attack.
Accident_vasculaire: Stroke (CVA), cognitive decline, memory disorders and depression.
Risque_multiplié_par_7: Up to 7 times higher risk of road accidents due to excessive daytime sleepiness.
Diabète_de_type_2: Type‑2 diabetes, insulin resistance, obesity and metabolic syndrome.
Une approche holistique pour des résulta: A holistic approach for sustainable results
Collaboration_étroite: Close collaboration with pulmonologists and sleep specialists for precise diagnostics and personalized treatments.
Appareils_PPC: Latest generation CPAP devices with digital monitoring and telemedicine for continuous treatment optimization.
Éducation_thérapeutique: Therapeutic education, psychological support and lifelong follow‑up for optimal treatment adherence.

presentation: G-MEDIC specializes in the distribution, rental, and consulting of advanced medical equipment. Our mission: to make advanced medical technologies accessible to everyone, combining quality, safety, and reliability.
innovation_accessible_slogan: Make medical innovations accessible to all professionals
modernisation_accompagnee_slogan: Support professionals in modernizing their technical platforms
durabilite_garantie_slogan: Promote the maintenance and durability of equipment
notre_vision_slogan: Give every healthcare professional the opportunity to work with the best medical tools, in service of human life.
nos_valeurs_slogan: Make cutting-edge medical technology accessible, without compromising on quality or safety.
accompagnement_personnalise_slogan: Our team of experts assists you in choosing, installing, and maintaining your equipment.
equipements_haute_performance_slogan: Discover our full range of next-generation CPAP devices for optimal treatment.
